entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who is struggling to speak ill of his old masters. He is being held by Harry Potter and is trying to convey a message about Draco Malfoy's treatment of him.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the one who is holding Dobby and listening to his message. He is trying to get information out of Kreacher about Draco Malfoy's activities.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is a house-elf who is being questioned by Harry Potter. He is trying to provide information about Draco Malfoy's activities, but is being defiant and uncooperative.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy is the one who is being discussed by Dobby and Kreacher. He is a master to house-elves, but is not treating them well.

relationships.description: Dobby is being held by Harry Potter. This relationship is described in the text as 'him around the middle and held him fast'.
Dobby is being defiant towards Kreacher. This relationship is described in the text as 'said defiantly to Kreacher'.
Harry Potter is questioning Kreacher about Draco Malfoy's activities. This relationship is described in the text as 'said Harry, cutting across Kreacher'.
Draco Malfoy is a master to Dobby. This relationship is described in the text as 'Dobby still finds it difficult to speak ill of his old masters ...'.
